item.title: Intermittent call processing issues
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Intermittent Processing Issues Identified Summary: The company has identified intermittent processing issues that may impact call processing for some accounts. The technical support team is working on a resolution.

Mar 4, 12:47 UTC
Identified - Dear Client,

We are observing intermittent processing issues due to which call processing for your account *might* be impacted.
The team has identified the issue and are working on the resolution.

Thanks and Regards
Observe.Ai Technical Support Team

item.title: [Interaction Processing] Degraded performance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Slowdown in Processing Interactions

The company has identified a slowdown in processing interactions affecting a portion of their user base. A fix is being deployed and the processing times are expected to return to normal within three hours. Thank you for your patience.

Feb 13, 21:17 UTC
Resolved - The slowdown has been cleared and fixes have been put in place to ensure it does not occur again.

Thank you for your patience during this time.

Feb 13, 20:16 UTC
Monitoring - We continue to monitor the slowdown of processing interactions as the trend continues to move in a positive direction. We expect that within three hours, interaction processing will be back to normal.

Feb 13, 18:57 UTC
Identified - We have identified a slowdown in the processing of interactions received by our system that affects a portion of our user base. A fix for this slowdown is currently being deployed at which point the slowdown will gradually come back down to expected processing times.

Please note that this is not affecting all tenants of the Observe.AI platform.

item.title: [Observe.AI Dashboard] Degraded performance
item.content:encoded:
Jan 11, 06:15 UTC
Resolved - Dear Client,
The issue stands resolved. In case you are still seeing performance issues while accessing the dashboard, please raise a ticket with Observe.Ai support via the help centre https://help.observe.ai/hc/en-us

We apologise for the inconvenience caused in this regard.

Thanks ans Regards.
Observe.Ai Technical Support Team

Jan 10, 21:23 UTC
Update - The previously mentioned propagation of relief for the system is currently expected to be fully rolled out in just under 5 hours from this writing.

We expect there to be some relief from the previously experienced system slowness at this current point. We expect fewer occurrences and lessened performance degredation as time goes on.

We are continuing to monitor the situation as we investigate the root cause and identify how to fully resolve the situation.

Jan 10, 19:08 UTC
Identified - A change has been made to the system that makes the backend calls which are experiencing degraded performance. This change will provide some relief to this issue once the changes have propogated.

Most actions are expected to behave normally as time goes on, though some slowness is expected to still be seen. We continue to actively investigate and monitor the situation.

Thank you for your continued patience,
Observe.AI Technical Support

Jan 10, 17:39 UTC
Investigating - We are aware of multiple reports of slowness being seen in a few areas (reports limited to the login and interactions tab) across the dashboard. We have engaged the necessary teams and are actively investigating the issue.

Thank you for your patience while we work on this issue,
Observe.AI Technical Support

item.title: Processing Delays (28th Nov, 2023)
item.content:encoded:
Nov 29, 05:43 UTC
Resolved - Dear Client,
All interactions should be available on the dashboard now. Request you to please review and reach out to support incase you are still seeing interaction processing issues.

Thanks
Observe.Ai Technical support Team

Nov 29, 02:30 UTC
Monitoring - Dear Client,
Issue stands resolved and we are monitoring closely. Backfills are in progress and any missing interaction from today (28th Nov) should be available on the dashboard in the next few hours.

Thank you for your patience and If you have any questions or experience any issues please contact Observe.AI Technical Support via the Help Center.

Thank you!
Observe.AI Technical Support

Nov 28, 23:45 UTC
Investigating - Dear Client,
We are seeing delays in processing interactions due to which certain calls might appear late on the dashboard. This is expected to be cleared out in the next few hours and all interactions should be available on the dashboard by the end of the day Pacific hours.

In case of any other queries, please feel free to open a ticket with support via the help centre https://help.observe.ai/hc/en-us

Thanks
Observe.Ai Technical support Team

item.title: Performance Degradation while accessing the Dashboard

Observe.Ai Support Team

item.title: Observe.AI : Intermittent Login Issues
item.content:encoded:
May 17, 17:17 UTC
Resolved - Dear Client,

The issue stands resolved and all users should be able to login to the Observe.AI platform.
In case you are not able to login to the platform, please clear the browser cache and re try. If the issue still exists, please create a ticket with support via the Help Center https://help.observe.ai/hc/en-us

Thanks
Observe.Ai Support Team

May 17, 15:58 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

May 17, 15:20 UTC
Investigating - Dear Client,

We are receiving reports of intermittent login issues on the Observe.AI platform and are looking into it on priority.
Will keep you posted with the developments.

Thank you for your patience,
Observe.AI Technical Support

item.title: Performance Degradation and Login Issues
item.content:encoded:
May 3, 18:08 UTC
Resolved - Dear Customer,
The login issue is now resolved.
In you are not able to login to the platform, please clear the browser cache and re try. If the issue still exists, please create a ticket with support via the Help Center https://help.observe.ai/hc/en-us

Thanks
Observe.Ai Support Team

May 3, 17:37 UTC
Update - Dear Customer,
Access to the reporting tab is fixed and there should be no further performance degradation.
With respect to the login issue, the google reCaptcha service is still down and we will keep you posted with more updates.

In case of any other queries, please create a ticket with support via the Help Center https://help.observe.ai/hc/en-us

Thanks
Observe.Ai Support Team

May 3, 17:06 UTC
Investigating - Dear Customer,
We are facing an issue with one of our services (google reCaptcha) due to which login to the platform might be impacted. In addition, we are seeing performance degradation in accessing the Reporting tab.

The team is working with the third party vendor on priority to resolve these issue.

We will keep you posted with more updates.

Thanks
Observe.Ai Support Team

item.title: Reporting Tab - March 9th, 2023
item.content:encoded:
Mar 9, 14:35 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the issues with the reporting tab have now been resolved. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the disruption and thank you for your patience while we worked to resolve the issue.

We appreciate your understanding during this time. As always, if you encounter any further issues or require assistance, please do not hesitate to submit a ticket via our Help Center.


Thank you!
Observe.AI Technical Support

Mar 9, 13:28 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an issue with the Reporting tab, as the page is not loading. Our Engineering team is aware of the issue and is working with the 3rd party vendor to resolve it. We will provide further updates as soon as they become available. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Please reach out to our Support Team if you have any questions or need any further assistance.
https://help.observe.ai/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thank you!
Observe.AI Technical Support

item.title: Call Processing Delay - February 22nd, 2023
item.content:encoded:
Feb 23, 19:20 UTC
Resolved - We are happy to report that the issue has been resolved, and our service is fully operational again. We would like to thank you for your patience and understanding while we worked to resolve the problem.

If you notice any further issues or have any concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Feb 22, 21:30 UTC
Investigating - We are aware that dashboards are currently receiving a Call Processing Delay, and our engineering teams are actively working to resolve the issue. Until fully resolved, interactions will be delayed from showing in the dashboards.

We will keep you up to date on any changes, and once this issue has been resolved.

We appreciate your patience, please don't hesitate to reach out to Support if you have any questions or concerns.

item.title: Degraded System Performance on Scorecard, Calls, and Leaderboard Pages
item.content:encoded:
Jan 12, 16:28 UTC
Resolved - Our engineering teams have fully resolved the issue, and users should no longer experience degraded system performance while using the Scorecard, Calls/Interactions, and Leaderboard pages. We will continue to monitor the system closely over the next few days.

Thank you for your patience and understanding as we resolved the issue.

Jan 12, 04:40 UTC
Identified - Our engineering team has worked with the third party to resolve the outage, and is currently working to validate the fix. We will keep you updated as we continue to make progress on the full resolution.

We appreciate your patience.

Jan 11, 23:35 UTC
Update - Our engineering teams are still working to resolve the issue, and have been able to mitigate a lot of the impact to users at this point. However, the underlying issue remains and has been identified to be the result of an outage with a third party application. We are engaged with them to resolve the issue, and in the meantime, users may still experience issues.

We will keep you updated as we continue to make progress on the full resolution.

Jan 11, 18:37 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 11, 18:16 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 11, 16:54 UTC
Investigating - We are aware that users are experiencing degraded system performance while using the Scorecard, Calls/Interactions, and Leaderboard pages within the OAI dashboard as seen by longer page load times and intermittent failures. Our engineering teams are actively working to resolve the issue. Until fully resolved, it is recommended that users facing these issues try to load a smaller amount of data, for example, 1 week instead of 2 weeks, or simply retry.

Coaching/QA workflows are not impacted and should continue to work as normal. We will keep you updated as we make progress on the resolution.

We appreciate your patience.

item.title: AutoQA AutoSubmit not being published for some Calls - December, 14 2022
item.content:encoded:
Dec 14, 18:06 UTC
Resolved - A fix has been deployed by our Engineering Team. Please reach out to support if you are still experiencing any issues opening or viewing evaluations.

https://help.observe.ai/hc/en-us/requests/new

Dec 14, 18:03 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Dec 14, 17:44 UTC
Identified - Engineering has found that a hotfix for AutoQa was released which caused this issue. Evaluations were not loaded for interactions that are eligible for AutoQa

We are rolling back the changes. This change will take an ETA of 30 Minutes.

Dec 14, 17:07 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating reports of AutoQA AutoSubmit not being published for some calls. This may impact evaluation visibility on some calls. Our engineering team is currently looking into this issue. We apologize for the inconvenience and will update you as soon as we have an update.

Thank you for your patience,

Observe.AI Technical Support

item.title: Call Delays
item.content:encoded:
Nov 24, 16:16 UTC
Resolved - Observe.AI Outage: Issue Description

The Call Delay have been resolved. Thank you for your patience while we’ve been working on this. We know the disruption may have been frustrating and we do appreciate you as a customer. If you have any further issues please submit a ticket via our Help Center.

Thank you!

Observe.AI Technical Support

Nov 23, 19:20 UTC
Identified - We have identified the underlying cause to be of missing calls. We are rolling out a fix in the next 24 hours so there will be delays in processing of 12-14 hours. We’ll continue to share updates as we have them.

item.title: Call Delays
item.content:encoded:
Oct 25, 18:40 UTC
Resolved - Hello,

The call pipeline delay should now be remediated. Our Engineering team has added more production servers to handle the load of API requests (specific to calls over 2 hours long). If you are a Genesys customer you may still experience a subset of missing calls, please put in a support request if you see any discrepancy.

If you have any questions or concerns please file a support ticket in our Help Center. Thanks again for your patience and partnership.

Thanks,
Observe.AI Support

Oct 22, 17:14 UTC
Update - Hello,

We are continuing to see significant delays in our call pipeline with call ingestions being delayed up to ~12 hours for many of our customers. Engineering will implement a temporary fix on Sunday 10/24 which will reduce the processing time from ~12 hours to ~2 hours (on top of our normal 2-hour processing time) and continue to plan for a permanent fix to get the processing time back to expected levels (2 hours).

Please wait up to 12 hours for your calls to be processed in Observe.AI and if you are still not seeing your calls after that time please put in a Support ticket for a one-off remediation: https://help.observe.ai/

Thank you for your patience and we’re extremely sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks,

Oct 22, 16:50 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Oct 22, 16:49 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Oct 22, 02:47 UTC
Monitoring - Hello,

We are seeing significant delays in our call pipeline due to a limitation with processing calls over 2 hours long. Because of this, all call ingestions are delayed up to 4-5 hours for all customers. As Engineering fixes the issue overnight please expect there to be a delay in your calls processed for the next 24-48 hours. We will come up with a remediation plan for each customer and backfill calls where necessary. Thank you for your patience and we will let you know once we have resolved the issue.

Thanks,
Observe.AI Technical Support

Oct 15, 18:53 UTC
Identified - We have identified an issue with TalkDesk customers not able to log into observe.ai via TalkDesk. We are currently working on resolving this issue, in the meantime please use this URL to access Observe.AI:

Thank you for your patience,

Observe.AI Technical Support
